R

RANDOM_EVENT_PROBABILITY - Variable in class GameEnvironment
The probability as a decimal that a random event will occur each time the team returns to the home base.
randomEvent() - Method in class GameEnvironment
Implements the possibility of a random event occurring to the team.
randomisedVillains(int) - Static method in class Villain
Creates an ArrayList of instances of Villain subclasses of the given length.
randomiseSectorLocations() - Method in class City
Initialises the sectorLocations HashMap with the home base location mapped to the home base sector, and a random mapping between the other four locations and sector types.
readyToIncrement() - Method in class HealingItem
Checks if the healing item should be incremented.
refresh() - Method in class HomeBasePanel
Refresh all components of the HomeBasePanel by refreshing any panels which contain components whose attributes may have changed since they were last viewed.
refresh() - Method in class HospitalPanel
Refresh all panels belonging to HospitalPanel which display information which may have changed.
refresh() - Method in class PowerUpDenPanel
Refreshes this panel by updating dynamic components.
refresh() - Method in interface Refreshable
 
refresh() - Method in class ShopPanel
Refreshes the panel by updating all dynamic components.
refresh() - Method in class VillainsLairPanel
Refresh all dynamic components belonging to this panel.
Refreshable - Interface in <Unnamed>
Panels which contain dynamic components should implement the Refreshable interface.
refreshAddHeroPanel() - Method in class SetUpPanel
Called after each hero is added.
refreshApplyButton() - Method in class HospitalPanel
Enables the Apply button if there is a hero and a healing item selected, otherwise disables it.
refreshApplyButton() - Method in class PowerUpDenPanel
Enables the Apply button if there is a hero and a power up selected, otherwise disables it.
refreshApplyPanel() - Method in class HospitalPanel
Removes all components from the apply panel, and adds them again.
refreshBattlePanel() - Method in class VillainsLairPanel
Removes all components from the battle panel and reloads them.
refreshContentPanel() - Method in class PowerUpDenPanel
Removes all components from the content panel, and adds them again.
refreshContentPanel() - Method in class VillainsLairPanel
Refresh all dynamic components belonging to contentPanel.
refreshEndGamePanel(String, boolean) - Method in class PaperScissorsRockPanel
Refreshes the endGame panel by creating components and setting their attributed depening on the result of the game, including if the game was won via a Tiebreaker power-up.
refreshGamePanel() - Method in class PaperScissorsRockPanel
Refreshes gamePanel by updating labels to show the correct image.
refreshGameResultPanel() - Method in class VillainsLairPanel
Adds all the required components to show the result of the most recent mini game.
refreshGoButton() - Method in class VillainsLairPanel
Refresh the 'Go' button by enabling it if and only if a valid hero has been selected.
refreshMapPanel() - Method in class HomeBasePanel
Update the map panel by updating all components with variable attributes.
refreshSelectHeroPanel() - Method in class VillainsLairPanel
Refresh all dynamic components belonging to the select hero panel.
refreshSidePanel() - Method in class HomeBasePanel
Update the side panel on the home base screen, by updating all components with variable attributes.
refreshStatusPanel() - Method in class HomeBasePanel
Updates variable fields in the statusPanel Called whenever the statusPanel is displayed
refreshStatusPanel() - Method in class HospitalPanel
Refreshes the status panel by removing and rebuilding all its components.
refreshTeamSummaryPanel() - Method in class SetUpPanel
Shows the team name, and creates an information panel for each hero in the team.
registerAll() - Static method in class MyFont
Registers all imported fonts used in the game.
REGULAR_VILLAINS - Static variable in class Villain
An array of class objects of all the villain subclasses except the super villain, to be used when initialising the list of villains in a new game.
remainingTimesToDefeat() - Method in class Villain
Returns the number of defeats remaining until the villain is killed.
removeAllPowerUps(PowerUpType) - Method in class MiniGame
Removes all the power ups of the given type from the hero playing the game.
removePowerUps(PowerUpType, int) - Method in class MiniGame
Removes the given number of power ups of the given type from the hero playing the game.
result - Variable in class DiceRolls
The result of the last round of the game.
revealNot() - Method in class PaperScissorsRock
Returns one of the choices that the villain did not make.
robTeam() - Method in class GameEnvironment
Removes a random power up or healing item from the team.
roll() - Method in class DiceRolls
Carries out one round of a dice rolls game.
rollIncrease - Variable in class DiceRolls
The bonus added to each die roll of the hero.
